title: Project-Based Expert Competency Development Course for AI-Integrated Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Project-based application of AI-integrated instructional design in real-world professional settings by medical, legal, and technical experts

learning_goals: The educational design process incorporating AI tools across the five phases of the ADDIE model can be explained
A customized educational content development plan can be established through learner diagnostic data analysis
Case-based project materials by discipline can be produced using generative AI tools
An AI-based assessment system can be designed to generate educational effectiveness analysis reports
Ethical issues that may arise in AI-assisted instructional design can be identified and mitigation strategies proposed
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
